title: My First Blog Post
content:
# Welcome to My Blog

This is my first blog post on my GitHub Pages site. I'm excited to share my thoughts and experiences about computer vision, deep learning, and technology.

## Why I Started This Blog

I wanted to create a space where I could:
- Share my research findings
- Document my learning journey
- Connect with other researchers and developers
- Showcase my projects and achievements

## What to Expect

In this blog, you'll find posts about:
- Computer vision research
- Deep learning tutorials
- Project updates
- Industry insights

Stay tuned for more content!
author: Tian Lianghai
